name: MEC Timeless Dress - Women's
description:
Simple, soft and stretchy, this light summer dress is patio ready. With its adjustable waistband, the Timeless Dress lets you customize the silhouette, from cinched to subtly tapered.Light recycled polyester blend with spandex for comfortable stretch.Deep arm openings and rear slit help keep you cool.2 stealthy hand pockets.Dropped hem.UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV.DWR finish keeps your dress looking better between washes and makes it dry even quicker.Relaxed fit offers a casual all-day comfort.

        Sustainability
